name: Mana-Tech Armor Simulator
description:
The world is being under attacked by giant monsters. It is up to you to pilot a magic-powered giant robot, the Mana-Tech Armor, to face this threat! 

Customize your armor with different weapons and equipment, and enter the cockpit to battle monsters face to face. The fate of the world may be in your hands!

A short game made for the 5th Annual Driftwood Game Jam (https://itch.io/jam/5adj) utilizing RTP assets only. Had a lot of fun putting this together!

Have fun!

Edit: Now updated to make the tutorial more accessible.
